regular-body:
Today we lay in bed and we just hugged each other.. we hugged each other to sleep. It is as if we are making up for the lost time during the last few days when we did not meet each other. Like holding on to the moment and not wanting it to be lost. Like making sure both of us still care and have feelings for each other. My thought are filled with her when I am with her.. why is that? What about him?

– Cleoie, In Bed Together
